mapper.select: SELECT VHC.VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO , VHC.CHAS_NO , VHC.MODEL_NM , CORP.CORP_NM , VHC.USE_YN , LOC.LATI , LOC.LONGI , LOC.SPD , LOC.HEADING , VHC.REMARK FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CORP ON VHC.CORP_ID = CORP.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_LOC LOC ON DVC.MNG_ID = LOC.MNG_ID WHERE DVC.DVC_KIND = 'CD005' AND VHC.MODEL_NM = '전기굴절버스'
